Question: This person has been linked by newspapers with other women, including gymnast Alina Kabayeva and ex-spy Anna Chapman.
Hints: This person biographer Masha Gessen has stated that "This person is a dictator," comparing him to Alexander Lukashenko.
The "Strategy 2020" was first presented by this person on the Extended Meeting of the State Council on 8 February 2008.
Currently, this person holds a 6th dan (red/white belt) and is best known for his Harai Goshi (sweeping hip throw).
